name: Identity Thief
description: Mild mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

review.author: UniqueParticle
review.heading: Maybe I'm weird but I love this movie!
review.reviewBody: Such a fun film I kinda understand the hate but I could watch this so many times. I absolutely love the dialogue especially from Jason Bateman and Melissa McCarthy they're both delightful throughout! A bit ridiculous in some bits that shouldn't be so bad it's not an award worthy just glorious Seth Gordon greatness.

keywords: credit card,odd couple,male female friendship,impersonator,rental car
